About API Evangelist

Learn more about how and why the API Evangelist has been studying the technology, business, policies, and people of APIs since 2010.

15 years
auto_stories

Stories

Over 4,000 stories told on the API Evangelist blog since 2010, covering almost every aspect of how APIs are changing the way we live and work.

4,000 stories
api

APIs

Individual API resources and capabilities from across many different providers and business sectors, complete with API reviews of their OpenAPI.

1700 APIs
forum

Conversations

Regular conversations with API producers, consumers, and service providers about how they see APIs and what their biggest challenges are.

25 conversations
grid_guides

Guidance

Modular guidance for teams producing and consuming APIs, providing snackable real-time guidance related to how to keep moving forward with APIs.

33 standards
contract

Contracts

The business and technical details of API resources offered from across different entities who are operating within almost every business sector.

259 contracts
policy

Policies

The business reasons behind why we are governing API operations, aligning the engineering side of operations with the business side of things.

175 policies
dictionary

Vocabularies

Organizing the words we use to describe API resources and capabilities and use them to better organize API operations to help us get on the same page.

5,000 word vocabulary
zone_person_urgent

Experiences

The real world human experience across teams who are producing APIs, the consumers who are applying and integrating them as part of business.

25 experiences
strategy

Strategies

Establishing high-level approaches to shifting the direction API operations moves, aligning API policies and experiences across API operations.

23 posts
design_services

Services

The services that API Evangelist and partners offer to support API operations at the strategic or tactical levels, helping you build your enterprise platform.

18 services
rule

Rules

Technical details of API operations that can be automated and enforced, and used to align policies with strategy to deliver the desired experience.

420 rules
schema

Schema

The naming and structure of the digital objects that we are passing back and forth via APIs within the business and personal applications we use.

800 schema
checklist

Properties

Individual properties of API operations that can be linked to strategy, experience, and policies, but then also governed to standardize how things work.

180 properties
fact_check

Standards

Common Internet or industry standards used to consistently define API operations, ensuring that the API factory floor is well defined and interoperable.

33 standards
construction

Tools

The open-source tooling that I use to build API Evangelist and advise that my audience adopt to help ensure more control over our enterprise platforms.

18 services
